definitions.definition: To add chocolate to; to cover (food) in chocolate.
definitions.label_groups: transitive , rare , chiefly in the past participle

definitions.definition: To treat blood agar by heating in order to lyse the red blood cells in the medium.

main_definition: ( transitive , rare , chiefly in the past participle ) To add chocolate to; to cover (food) in chocolate.
secondary_definitions: ( rare , biology ) To treat blood agar by heating in order to lyse the red blood cells in the medium.
